summary:
15 Lunari followers for your enjoyment. They can be found in 5 different inns. 
UNPB-BBP meshes optional file that can be used for the Lunari race.
Natural hair color optional file added.
descriptionHtml:
[img=center] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-1-1365795659.jpg [/img]
[center][heading][color=blue]Description:[/color][/heading] 
These are 15 of my Lunari companions.They can all be married.
This can be used with any of the Lunari body types. 
They are their own faction to stop them from fighting each other.
They have been placed in 5 different inns across Skyrim.
Along with the girls this .esp adds hair colors to the Lunari race sliders. No other races will be affected.
I have also added 15 warpaints to the females from[color=green] Wyldsong\'s[/color] and[color=green] SheWildWolf\'s[/color] paints to[color=green] bhaktisean\'s[/color] Tattoo/Paints. They are in a .bsa file. To get these to work properly in the CK I added warpaint colors to the race, so there is now 40 paint colors instead of 24.
[b][color=red]This .esp uses[/color][color=green] bhaktisean\'s Tattoos[/color][color=red] if you would like it without let me know.[/color][/b]  
Last I added 3 freckled textures to the females. I did this for 2 reasons: a) to add variety  b) to give you the option to replace one or more that you don\'t like. 
To do this you need to rename the file to: FemaleHeadLunariDetail_Frekles001, 002, or 003. After renaming it replace the file in: textures/bhakti/lunari/actors/character/female.

The optional files will include the meshes for UNPB-BBP for those that want that. They can be used just for the Lunari race without downloding my Angels!

[heading][color=red]Updates[/color][/heading]
Added three new files 1.63a & 1.63b differ in only the girls not pictured by Xmacrosax. 
1.63c changes the skin tones of most of the girls to Lunari skin tones. The girls that remained unchanged are Onyii, Ryka, Virjha, Eriin, & Kit.
[b][color=red]Thanks to xmacrosx for posting great pics![/color][/b]

[heading][color=green]Where you can find the girls:[/color][/heading]

[color=green][u]Four Shields Inn at Dragonbridge:[/u][/color]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-3-1365804670.jpg[/img]
Mona
Combat Assassin, Lvl 8-105
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-2-1365806488.jpg[/img]
Nuirry 
Combat Mage Conjurer, Lvl 4-95
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-4-1365804670.jpg[/img]
Onyii
Combat Mage Necro, Lvl 7-90


[color=green][u]Braidwood Inn at Kynesgrove:[/u][/color]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-5-1365804670.jpg[/img]
Perta
Combat Mage Destruction, Lvl 9-100
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-1-1365804759.jpg[/img]
Ryka
Combat Barbarian, Lvl 4-95
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-3-1365804759.jpg[/img]
Virjha
Combat Spellsword, Lvl 3-85

[color=green][u]Nightgate Inn:[/u][/color]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-1-1365804637.jpg[/img]
Bella
Combat Warrior 1H, Lvl 10-115
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-2-1365804670.jpg[/img]
Layla
Combat Thief, Lvl 6-110
[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-2-1365884088.jpg[/img]
Tatianna
Combat Ranger, Lvl 9-112


[color=green][u]Old Hroldan Inn:[/u][/color]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-2-1365804637.jpg[/img]
Caytri
Combat Mage Elemental, Lvl 5-85
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-3-1365804638.jpg[/img]
Dawn
Combat Nightblade, Lvl 4-110
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-4-1365804638.jpg[/img]
Dialla
Combat Scout, Lvl 6-100

[color=green][u]Frostfruit Inn at Rorikstead:[/u][/color]
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-5-1365804638.jpg[/img]
Eriin
Combat Nightingale, Lvl 5-105
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-1-1365806488.jpg[/img]
Ivy
Combat Rouge, Lvl 4-100
[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34704-1-1365884088.jpg[/img]
Kit
Combat Warrior 2H, Lvl 5-105


[heading][color=red]Required:[/color][/heading]
Bhaktisean\'s[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602] Lunari Race[/url]
TMPhoenix\'s[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168] Race Compatibility[/url]

[b][color=red](None of these need to be active, .esm files can be deleted)[/color][/b]
Apachii\'s[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168] SkyHair v1.5 & SkyFemale v1.3[/url]
Radioragae[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110] Oblivion Hair Packs 1,2,3,4, & 6[/url]


[heading][color=green] Recommended:[/color][/heading] 
xs2reality\'s[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13377] Sporty Sexy Maps[/url]
(to install copy and overwrite the files in: textures/bhakti/lunari/actors/character/female)
fLokii\'s[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037] UltimateFollowerOverhaul[/url]

[b][color=red][u]Place this .esp after UFO or any other like mod.

No known conflicts! 

I would like to combine the hairs into this file but have not yet been given permission[/u][/color][/b]

[heading][color=green]Installation:[/color][/heading]
Should work with any installer.

[heading][color=green]Manual Install:[/color][/heading]
Extract the .zip file to the place of your choosing and copy to your data folder. The optional UNPB-BBP file will require an overwrite. 


[heading][color=red]Credits:[/color][/heading]
bhaktisean for the Lunari race.
Apachii for her hair mods.
Radioragae for the Oblivion hair packs and the original authors.
Wylsong for letting me use his warpaints.
SheWildWolf for letting me use her warpaints as well.
Calyps for allowing me to include his meshes. 
[b][color=green]They all have done wonderful work and deserve more credit than I do.[/color][/b][/center]
